title: Spicy Pasta with Fresh Tomato Sauce
ingredients: ['500g packet vermicelli pasta', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 teaspoon minced garlic', '13 plum tomatoes, chopped', '1 tablespoon salt', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley', '1 tablespoon Cajun seasoning', '60g grated mozzarella cheese', '40g grated Parmesan cheese']
